summary: Completed comprehensive testing of KommunalCRM app after Base44 SDK removal. Backend API is fully functional with 100% test success rate. Frontend authentication, registration, and dashboard features are working excellently. Fixed critical backend bug where CRUD routes were not being created.

design_issues.issue: Logout button/menu not easily discoverable in the user interface
design_issues.details: Users may have difficulty finding how to logout from the application

passed_tests: Backend API health check returns healthy status
User authentication and token management working
User registration creates new accounts and redirects to setup
All CRUD endpoints for organizations and contacts functional
Login page loads and displays correctly with proper branding
Dashboard loads after login with user name (Max Mustermann) displayed
Navigation sidebar with 16 links works correctly
Calendar view renders properly with navigation controls
Stat cards display correctly with proper icons and colors
Organization setup flow for new users works correctly
All API endpoints returning proper status codes and data
action_item_for_main_agent: Add a more discoverable logout button or user menu in the dashboard interface. Currently users may have difficulty finding how to logout from the application.
success_percentage: backend: 100% (14/14 tests passed), frontend: 95% (logout discoverability issue)
